value.name: Yemassee man faces charges after hit and run
value.description: Yemassee Police say Christopher Ulmer was involved in a domestic dispute and ran over several people as he drove away from the scene. This was around 9:30 p.m. at the intersection of Church Street South and Green Street. Two people were seriously hurt and ...

value.name: 4 injured, driver arrested after hit-and-run crash in Yemassee
value.description: The Yemassee Police Department says around 9:30 p.m. Thursday night, Christopher Ulmer was involved in a domestic dispute and ran over several people as he drove away from the scene. It happened at the intersection of Church Street South and Green Street.
